LanguageData.Leather_WoWMagharOrc.label: 玛格汉兽人皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWMagharOrc.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Mag'har Orc skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWNightborne.label: 夜之子皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWNightborne.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Nightborne skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWVoidElf.label: 虚空精灵皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWVoidElf.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Void Elf skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
